summary: NAR 1/29/2003. WITHIN THE FIRST 3 MONTHS OF OWING THE VEHICLE, THE SAFETY BELT ON THE REAR PASSENGER 3RD SEAT MALFUNCTIONED. THE SEAT BELT CAN'T BE PULLED AWAY FROM THE SEAT BACK TO SEURE IT AND ANY PASSENGERS. GM WOULD NOT COVER THE SEAT BELT UNDER WARRANTY, THEY STATED THAT THE MILEAGE LIMIT ON THE WARRANTY HAD EXPIRED.  *JB
